title: 有关citizen插件皮肤设置的问题！
author: lunxu3671
txt_content:
在citizens这个插件中/npc skin (-c -l(atest)) [name] (or -t [uuid/name] [date] [signature]),


有人在一篇教程中回复“
感谢分享，不过我记得在/npc skin这一项中有一个赋值是可以固定当前皮肤的，-t还是-p忘了，就是固定当前皮肤ID的皮肤即使此ID换了皮肤（不知我这种叙述对不对）”




请问具体是怎么固定皮肤呢

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
lunxu3671 发表于 2020-1-17 20:51
显示：
unkown flag ：-p
/npc skin (-c -l(atest)) [name] (or -t  [date] [signature])
嗯，新版本是默认固定，除非使用参数才会实时更新皮肤
You can use /npc skin [NAME] -l (a lowercase L) to always use the latest skin for the player (updating if the player changes their skin). If this is not set, the current skin (at time of using the command) will be retained.

replies.author: lunxu3671
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-17 20:45
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=705324&pid=11994322
显示：
unkown flag ：-p
/npc skin (-c -l(atest)) [name] (or -t [uuid/name] [date] [signature])
看样子没有这个参数啊

replies.author: lunxu3671
replies.txt_content:
